## DataViewMeasureValue.getFormattedValue() method

Gets a formatted string that can be used to display this measure. The numerical value is formatted using the formatting settings in Spotfire.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getFormattedValue(): string;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`string`
